short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See where nimble.li links lead you to without clicking on them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unfold helps you preview where nimble.li links lead you before clicking on them. 

You may use this to: 
✅ Test your own short links.
✅ Test your random/even distribution links.
✅ Test more complex links that include variables.
✅ Unshorten a link you don't fully trust, without clicking it.

⚠️ This extension only works with links generated using Nimble Links (www.nimblelinks.com).
